verses.text: Hear \w this|strong="H1121"\w*, all ye peoples; give ear, all ye inhabitants \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* world:
\w Both|strong="H3605"\w* low \w and|strong="H5971"\w* high, rich \w and|strong="H5971"\w* poor \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1571"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* speak wisdom; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* understanding.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* incline \w mine|strong="H1696"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* parable: \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* open \w my|strong="H1696"\w* dark \w saying|strong="H1696"\w* upon \w the|strong="H1696"\w* harp.
Wherefore should I fear \w in|strong="H4912"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* days \w of|strong="H4912"\w* evil, when iniquity \w at|strong="H2420"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* heels compasseth me about?

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* wealth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* boast \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* riches;

None \add of them \add*can \w by|strong="H5921"\w* any means redeem \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother, nor \w give|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ransom \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*:

(\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w redemption|strong="H6299"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3808"\w* costly, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* alone \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w*:)
\w That|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5315"\w* should still live \w alway|strong="H5769"\w*, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5315"\w* should \w not|strong="H2308"\w* see corruption.

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* wise men die, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fool \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* brutish together perish, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w leave|strong="H2421"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* others.

\w Their|strong="H7200"\w* inward thought \w is|strong="H3684"\w*, \add that \add*\w their|strong="H7200"\w* houses \add shall continue \add*\w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever, \add and \add*\w their|strong="H7200"\w* dwelling places \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* generations; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* call \w their|strong="H7200"\w* lands \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* own names.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* man abideth not \w in|strong="H5921"\w* honour: \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beasts \w that|strong="H7121"\w* perish.
\w This|strong="H3885"\w* their way is their folly: yet after them men approve their sayings. \qs Selah\qs*

\w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* appointed \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock \w for|strong="H2088"\w* Sheol; death \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* shepherd: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* upright \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* dominion over \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w morning|strong="H2088"\w*; \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* beauty \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H2088"\w* Sheol \w to|strong="H1870"\w* consume, \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w no|strong="H6310"\w* habitation \w for|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H2088"\w*.

But God \w will|strong="H3477"\w* redeem \w my|strong="H7462"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* power \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*: \w for|strong="H6629"\w* \w he|strong="H1242"\w* \w shall|strong="H3477"\w* receive me. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Be|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* afraid \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H3947"\w* rich, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* house \w is|strong="H5315"\w* increased:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* dieth \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* carry nothing away; \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* descend \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7235"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* lived \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* doest well \w to|strong="H3381"\w* thyself,

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* generation \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* fathers; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* never see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* light.

\w Man|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H1755"\w* \w in|strong="H1755"\w* honour, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* understandeth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w is|strong="H1755"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* beasts \w that|strong="H7200"\w* perish.
